title: Officers suspended over Nashville Manifesto leak reinstated, investigators couldn't figure out who leaked to Steven Crowder
description:
Let the lefties in your life know you fight like hell with the classic FIGHT LIKE HELL tee! Buy the shirt at CrowderShop.com.


All of the Nashville police officers suspended over the Nashville Manifesto leak have returned to regular duty. The department "exhausted" all available approaches to identify the person responsible. And we know what you're thinking.

— (@)


— (@)

title: Urban radio host Biden famously implied "ain't black" BODIES his reelection chances: "He's not getting any more popular"
description:
Yes, Die Hard is a Christmas Movie! Dare your friends to change your mind with our new Christmas long sleeve!

I am well aware Charlamagne tha God is not conservative and has no love for the right. It's still fun watching him blast the left. Progressives have Ana Navaro and Alyssa Farah Griffin yakking it up with the other shrill harpies on The View. Coservatives have Charlamagne and the world's most dangerous morning show.

Though Charlamagne wasn't on The Breakfast Club. he was guest hosting The Daily Show, the most trusted name in finger quot

title: "So it shall be": Elon Musk confirms Alex Jones is REINSTATED on X/Twitter
description:
Everyone that signs up for MugClub right now a full month completely FREE with promo code ALEX!

Now it's official. Elon Musk confirmed Alex Jones will be reinstated on Twitter. Which is now known as X. Which we'll all still call Twitter.

There was confusion yesterday when a poll on Twitter was conducted on bringing Alex back. That wasn't an official poll. Only Elon can conduct the official poll.

— (@)

The results are in. And with close to TWO MILLION USER
